replies.replyComment: @priyantha waduge kauru avath othanata ehemai. mama giyath oya giyath.    thannahava vedi vedi unama  mula mathaka nee. hee hee

@priyantha waduge hapoi     2020 janadi pathi unoth  kiyana okkoma karann puluvan kiyala visavada oba thumata. ara  my3 sajith vage    mandira valata yanne ne kiyala  noya idi kiyala.    mahinda parada unama gota  amarikavata giya vage    venne ne kiyala visvasada? anika meyath    dithva puravesi yek neda?   ithin kohomada api visavasa karanne. eka paarak gembekva   visvasa karala  anithimata 2009ta kalin thibba baya thamai ithuru une.   kaava vath visavasa nehe.
Meya e wenuwen peni idapu kenek. Dan awrudu 10k tisse ewa tamai kare. Oba nodannawa wenna puluwan.

Sajin. Math danne oba kiyanademai. Me nagarawala inna social media diaspora haraha awata maha janathawa danneth na viswasa wenneth na. Ohoma wenas karano kiya 1971,88,89 godak maruna eyalath maruwa godak vimukthiyata kiyala. Monataram amma thathta ada aththammala dukenda e athdakimen. Ohoma tama awe vyawasthawa waradi kia. Dan lokuma de vyawasthawe warada newe rate palakayek na rookada anduwak videsa hasthayath kalusallith 226 denek horakama kathanayaka indala. Ounge waradath law and order karanna nodi desapaluvo hasirena vidiyath ewagema api janathawath na chande enakam satanak awadiyak tamange wadema misa. Ekai wenas wennaona. Meke prasne vikalpe newe seramata ona loku putuwa ekasareta dan wayasa hari ratath gihin rakiyath na, owata janathawa rawatenne nane dan. Ratata ona dan araksawa akramana walakwala hora givisum nawatwala arthika padanamak ekka nayakathwe aluth palanayak. Nagala ho oi viyath kiyapu ayata ehema plan mandate na nikam banino hamotama ara tharunayo gedara job nathiwa thathta ammata banino wage api duppath apita lambagoni na kiya! Oi ranganayata me sare mona nalubatto awath janathawa rawatenne na. Mewaye wadihariyak messages rata inna aya chandeth na

comments.comment:
As long as our die-hard not far thinking Sinhalese are divided into  the Blues, the Green or the Red, we will not have the future we are expecting to have in this country.!!!.!!!! It's because for the past 71 years, these divisions and policy changes by different parties and politicians, our country is at a standstill, while all other countries are more advance without taking loans.!!!! The borrowed money by every government specially for the benefit of politicians, to pay high rents to buildings. buy luxury vehicles, hordes of security, Secretaries, extra-ordinary special allowances for politicians are the main reason that we have become indebted to many countries, instead of using that money to develop the country.!!!!!
We need a total change and for that Mr. Nagananda's policies are highly suitable to bring back dignity of the voters in this country, as it's the 22 million voters who will decide the rules, not bunch of 225 thoughtless, greedy politicians.!!!!!
comments.author: KENSHIRO
